mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(u_id, u_pw, u_nickname, u_email) values(#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where u_id = #{u_id} and u_pw = #{u_pw}
select u_id from tbl_user where u_email = #{u_email}
select u_email from tbl_user where u_id = #{u_id}
